Detailed Description

This class conducts sgf input interpretation.

This class contains functions to read sgf input and convert it into board representation. It is actually a simple finite automata. State function is simulated with State_function_vector

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Sgf_parser (  ) 

Constructor.

In constructor, the state function and tokens are defined.

Member Function Documentation

bool parse_sgf ( string  filename_  ) 

Function coordinating process of sgf parsing.

Parameters:
[in] filename_ Name of input sgf file. return Returns whether sgf was sucessfully parsed.

This function coordinates transfer of sgf file into pos_db_record using Sgf_parser::resolve() function. If returns false, parsing was unsuccessfull and no search is performed.

bool resolve ( char  act_char,
string  act_text 
)

Resolving single characters of sgf input.

Parameters:
int] act_char Represents actually read character from sgf intput.
int] act_text Contains string from last saved value
Returns:
This function returns information whether was the character accepted as ,,important" one ( it transfers automata from actual state to some new one )

This functino tries to find a transition from actual state to a new one "along the edge" represented by act_char character. Then performs actions connected with previous state ( like placing a stone , ... ) and switches automata to new state.
